DOC.brief_summary: This study implement test brief , tailor individual-level intervention use two New Orleans adolescent clinic female patient age 16-24 douche .
DOC.brief_title: Brief , Behavioral Intervention Reduce Douching Among Adolescent Young Women
DOC.detailed_description: The study implement client-centered behavioral intervention ( CCBI ) base Prochaska ’ Transtheoretical Model Change ( TMC ) intervention use Miller ’ Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) techniques . This intervention evaluate use ( 1 ) audio/computer-assisted self-administered interview ( ACASI ) survey assess change respondent ’ douche knowledge , attitude , practice , ( 2 ) biological test Bacterial Vaginosis .
DOC.criteria: Women attend age 16 24 douche least last 180 day , agree test Bacterial Vaginosis , agree allow u contact telephone person followup interview test bacterial vaginosis . currently pregnant , nonEnglish speaking
